ing: 1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle chilled white cranberry-peach juice (such as Ocean SprayÂ® White Cran-Peach)
1 liter chilled lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®)
2 (11.5 ounce) cans peach juice, chilled, or to taste
des: "This is a beautiful, tasty punch that is simple to make. Frozen peaches makes this punch stand out on the table. All liquid should be cold before starting!"
ins: Mix white cranberry juice, lemon-lime soda, and peach juice together in a punch bowl. Float as many peach slices and raspberries in the punch as desired. Place remaining fruit back in freezer and add as needed.
